mapper.select: SELECT A.APP_ID AS APPID , A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_NM , A.SVC_DTL FROM TB_SVC A , TB_SVC_AUTH B , TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP C WHERE A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = C.AUTH_GRP_ID AND C.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
SELECT TEMPLATECODE ,MESSAGE ,REGDATE ,MODDATE FROM T_PUSH_TEMPLATE ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT A.GROUPSEQ ,A.GROUPNAME ,A.REGDATE ,A.MODDATE ,IF(B.GROUPCNT IS NULL, 0, B.GROUPCNT) GROUPCNT FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUPSEQ, COUNT(*) AS GROUPCNT FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP GROUP BY GROUPSEQ ) B ON A.GROUPSEQ = B.GROUPSEQ WHERE ISDELETED = 'N'
